<E>
I used the Gradient Descent algorithm.

<F>
I used a step factor of 0.05.
The algorithm stopping condition required the magnitude of the gradient vector
to be below a certain epsilon. The epsilon I chose was 0.001.

factor to get the gradient descent algorithm to work.
